Hey Mr. Tom. Remember the 50 th anniversary NBTHK show in Tokyo? Gordon Ro=
bson gave a speech and included old style Japanese. Mike Yamazaki won the s=
hinsa competition. You were there and some chick that did Iai. Man was that=
 a good time. I was in the Shinto room looking at swords with Mitsuo Hataya=
 Sensei when the Japanese president came thru. He had these 7 foot tall bod=
y guards. 
    
    __._,_._Hey Tom, remeber the 50th anniversery=A0 (?)=A0=
